content: खाद् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (खादति, खादित) {@--1@} To eat, devour, feed; to prey upon, bite; प्राक्पादयोः पतति खादति पृष्ठमांसं <ls>H. 1. 81</ls>; खादन्मांसं न दुष्यति <ls>Ms. 5. 32</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 5.">53</ls>; <ls>Bk. 6. 6</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">9. 78</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">14. 87</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 14.">101</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">15. 35.</ls> {@--2@} To hurt.
